        <script>========================================= UI Action to Pop URL Examples ===================================================
Onclick: popupWindow()

Script:
//action.setRedirectURL('http://www.google.com');
function popupWindow(){
     var url = 'https://www.google.com/?gws_rd=ssl#q=' + g_form.getValue('short_description');
     //open in new window:
     var win = window.open(url);
     win.focus();
}</script>
        <script_2/>
        <script_type/>
        <short_description>UI Action to Pop URL Examples </short_description>
